title: New: Foster The People – Helena Beat (Com Truise)
body:
After hearing that dreadful _Pumped Up Pricks_ track by LA’s **Foster The People**, I swore to never listen to any of their music ever again.

Therefore, I haven’t actually heard the original version of this remix by beat-maestro **Com Truise**, but I’d imagine this reworked cut is far superior. Either way, Haley injects a much needed energy into **FTP’s** music, turning _Helena Beat_ into a gyrating, foot-stomping dance number. Check out **Com Truise’s** remix of _Helena Beat_ below.

 [Foster The People – Helena Beat (Com Truise Remix)](http://soundcloud.com/com-truise/foster-the-people-helena-beat) by [Com Truise](http://soundcloud.com/com-truise)
